name: Name
title: Title
joinIntro: Join Fighters and start your journey to a healthier, stronger, and happier you. We support every level — from beginners to advanced athletes.
signupToday: Sign up today and get your first week free. Experience our premium equipment, professional trainers, and supportive community.
aboutIntro: We are Fighters - a modern training center dedicated to helping people achieve their health and fitness goals in a supportive and professional environment.
missionText: Our mission is to provide a safe, motivating, and accessible training space for everyone — from beginners to advanced athletes.
trainingText: We offer a wide range of training programs designed to improve strength, endurance, flexibility, and overall wellness.
equipmentText: Fighters is equipped with state-of-the-art machines and training tools to ensure effective and enjoyable workouts.
cleanSafeText: Cleanliness and safety are our top priorities, ensuring a comfortable experience for all members.
weatherApiKeyNotSet: API key is not set. Please add VITE_WEATHER_API_KEY to the .env file
browserNotSupportLocation: Your browser does not support location
weatherApiKeyInvalid: Invalid API key. Please check your API key
weatherApiKeyCheckHint: Make sure the API key is activated in your OpenWeatherMap account (may take a few minutes)
weatherApiRateLimit: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later
weatherNetworkError: Network error. Please check your internet connection
weatherErrorHint: Please check the console for more details or try refreshing the page
locationAccessDenied: Unable to get your location. Please allow location access in your browser.
locationPermissionHint: You can allow location access in your browser settings
